name: Gelidry
description:
*Submission to the UWB Winter Quarter Project 2020 (Theme: Ice)

Synopsis: You wake up in an unfamiliar place. Through this short visual novel, you'll get to investigate around to learn more about you, where you are, and what might have happened.

Status: Currently unfinished (indefinitely)

Controls: Use your mouse or space bar to click and advance through the dialogue, choose menu options, and interact with objects on screen when prompted.

Credits

  • Story and Concept: All
  • Dialogue:  Alex Blaskovich, Adrienne Co, and Rina Yu
  • Background Art:  Alex Blaskovich
  • Human Character Portraits: Rachel Kudlacz
  • Reaper Portraits: Adrienne Co
  • Music: Ethan Yamashita
  • Programming: Adrienne Co

Made in Unity with the Fungus extension

More information on Fungus: https://fungusgames.com/

Fungus on the Unity asset store: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/templates/systems/fungus-34184
